name: Ho Chi Minh city museums
description:
Ho Chi Minh city is famous with a lot of museums. Each has a differrent theme such as: Museum of history, Ho Chi Minh museum, war remnants museum, independent palace, Ho Chi Minh city museum... And I'm so glad to take you to all this museum to get more knowledge about my countries and another side, my lovely city. Some museums that we visit
1. Ho Chi Minh museum
2. Museum of history
3. War remnants museum
4. Independent palace or Ho Chi Minh city museum
